Sleeveless dress woven in an airy cotton blend with embroidery and fringing. Two flounces at the top, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a layer of tulle for added width. Lined.

Imitation suede sandals with a decorative bow at the front and an elasticated heel strap. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Metal keyring with a faux fur pompom and a glittery, printed notebook. Size approx. 5x7.5 cm.
Plasters with print motifs. Supplied in a patterned metal box with a lid. Size of box 3x7x9.5 cm.

Suit trousers in a cotton weave with an extended waistband with adjustable elastication and concealed fastening. Zip fly and button, side pockets, fake back pockets with a flap and button and legs with creases.

Quilted, lightly padded nylon jacket with a lined drawstring hood and a zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring hem. Lined.

Set with a dress and pair of leggings in soft organic cotton. Denim dress with short, flounced sleeves, a gathered yoke at the front and wrapover with a fastening at the back. Leggings in patterned jersey with an elasticated waist.

Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Adjustable straps that fasten at the front, ribbed side sections, a kangaroo pocket with appliqués and a print motif, and ribbed hems.
All-in-one suit in lightweight, printed organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Press-studs on the shoulders, at the crotch and down the legs, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Platform sandals with wrapover straps in imitation suede decorated with studs and plastic beads. Moulded insoles and fluted rubber soles. Platform height approx. 3.5 cm.

Shirt in a viscose weave containing some linen with a resort collar, French front and short sleeves. Yoke at the back and a straight-cut hem. Relaxed fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.

Shirt in a viscose weave containing some linen with a resort collar, French front and short sleeves. Yoke at the back and a straight-cut hem. Relaxed fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.

Ankle boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side, a loop at the back and adjustable straps at the top with decorative, rounded studs and metal buckles. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Short, V-neck dress in woven fabric with a detachable tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in a patterned weave with a round neckline, concealed zip at the back and short sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of trousers in a soft organic cotton blend. Jersey bodysuit with a button placket and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist, a fake fly with buttons and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of trousers in a soft organic cotton blend. Jersey bodysuit with a button placket and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist, a fake fly with buttons and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs with studs down the sides.
Mules in imitation suede with pointed toes. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Hat in soft pile with decorative ears and ties under the chin.

Lightly padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a glittery print motif front and back, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a seam and wide flounce in woven fabric with broderie anglaise at the top. The flounce continues around the back, creating short, flounced sleeves.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a seam and wide flounce in woven fabric with broderie anglaise at the top. The flounce continues around the back, creating short, flounced sleeves.
Ankle-length trousers in soft, supple leather with a high waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and straight legs with seams at the knees.
Trousers in stretch twill with a high, elasticated waist and a concealed zip in one side. Fake welt pockets at the back and slim legs with creases and short slits at the hems.
